meanings.definition: The prominent bones in the face below the eye socket and above the jaw.
meanings.sent1: Her high cheekbones gave her face a unique look.
meanings.sent2: I noticed her cheekbones when she smiled.
meanings.sent3: The cheekbones on that cartoon character were so exaggerated, it made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the dim light, her cheekbones cast long shadows on her face.
meanings.sent5: The model's cheekbones were so sharp, they could cut through glass.

meanings.definition: The structure of the face that gives definition and shape to the cheeks.
meanings.sent1: His cheekbones were so defined, they stood out in every photo.
meanings.sent2: She applied makeup to enhance her cheekbones for the evening.
meanings.sent3: The clown's fake cheekbones were so big, they almost touched his ears.
meanings.sent4: Her cheekbones were like hills on her face, adding character to her features.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of her beauty in the curve of her cheekbones.
